name: Penguin Steed
text:
1 Level 3 "Penguin" monster
While this card is on the field or in the GY: If a "Penguin" monster is targeted by a card effect or would leave the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can banish this card; negate that effect, and if you do, return that card to the hand. If this card is destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your hand or GY, except "Penguin Steed". You can only use each effect of "Penguin Steed" once per turn.
